tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ********* *** ** **** **** *** *** ********** My wife is having an endometriosis problem. We felt that we may not have children for this life. But Dr Suchindra mam made us happy with her treatment and my wife is Pregnant now. Doctor was friendly with us and explains the problems and situation. She guided us in right way to get the pregnancy through IVF. And the IVF is successful in first attempt and my wife is in 3rd month now. We are a happy couple to have a such friendly doctor with good caring about the patients. We are extremely thankful to Dr Suchindra mam. And I will definitely and strongly recommend Dr Suchindra at Milann for any IVF process/treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was having PCOD problem,  based on the reviews from google i consulted Dr. Suchidra R at Milann Hospital, Indiranagar.  From my very first visit Dr.  took excellent care and provided treatment step by step. With in 3 months i became pregnant. Thanx a lot to her. She is truly professional and if anyone really looking for 100% result must visit Dr.  Suchindra R.  at Milann Hospital Indiranagar, Tons and tons of love to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
A doctor that humiliates and cannot overlook bias to treat patient. 

Since my regular gyny was away I had to meet Dr. Suchindra. I have a UTI which is an issue I have had on a recurring basis since I was 14 which is far before I became sexually active. All medical facts were overlooked and instead, i received dirty looks, rude comments and incorrect statements about my own history and diagnosis.
1. she did not read my case file - i visited earlier for a full health check up (vitimin B, D, Iron and sugar tests) compeltely separate from UTI. Yet she was fixated on "did you have sex even 2 months back?"
2. used fear instead of a solution - "if you keep doing this you will end up with an infection in your ovaries and not be able to have children". I visited a doctor on immediate symptoms of irritation (within 7 days) to ensure the infection in my urinary tract is fixed. There is no chance of it reaching my ovaries so soon. Have women not been put through enough humiliation and judgment to further receive it from a doctor we are seeking help from. 
3. "you must wear condoms", "you must be careful" atleast 3 times after i had also said this may be an allergic reaction to the condom.
4. UTI is so heavily linked to guilt and humiliation in women and the doctor has put me back in that cycle. People who have been through abuse or even have low vitimin D and C levels are more likely to contract it. Yet these medical questions were NOT asked. Instead, i was asked "Don't you ever plan to marry?"
5. I am 30, yes i have been in more than 1 committed relationship in my life. But to be stripped of the basic humanity and instead be made to feel dirty, have "multiple partners" written and circled on my case file and not be treated for my condition well by a medical professional is shocking. 
These are things that affect mental health. It is gross to know a doctor can misuse thier practice and shamed a patient so badly. I had to visit another gynecologist, spend my time, money and energy to get healed. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS DOCTOR to anyone regardless of what your life choices or lifestyle is.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
After a wait for 35 minutes the assistant takes down details. Then again 15 min wait. Weight and height checked. Again 15 min. Then asked to go for urine sample. Then realised that the Dept closes at 11. Then waited again for 20 min for a check up. 
**** *  ***** ** **** **** ** ****** * ******* I understand. I understand too. I paid 800 for consulting. I’m ok. Why then am I waiting then. For 2 hours. Why am I taking an appointment then ?
Stop wasting patients time and your own. Plan better. 
I will not recommend to anyone

review: She is really good and gives ample time and listens to our issues as well. I would definitely recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor shuchinra explained me very friendly and kindly i went for some uterus problem she explained me very well thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We didn't have baby for 4 years after marriage. For fertility treatment, we moved to Bangalore and after a long research we started consulting Dr.Suchindra .

She explained us the steps and progressive steps . Within a year of treatment , we got pregnant. Now we are blessed with a baby boy .

I recommend this doctor for friendliness, finding the cause and treatment. 

Thanks Doctor. Really Grateful to you

Came here with pcos problem. started treatment on 1st June 2020. Now I'm 3 month pregnant. highly satisfied with the treatment and care given by this hospital. Dr. Suchindra was very friendly and caring person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor is friendly. Listened patiently to all queries and concerns and responded promptly. 
Satisfied with her treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was a good experience she could’ve explained a little more but I guess for that gotta do more treatment
Dr Suchindra we don't have words to express our gratitude and towards entire staff. Milann is well maintained and organised. I thank her from the bottom of my heart.
Presented for vaginal burning. Was given a vaginal exam and gave a urine sample. did not receive a diagnosis, nor was asked to follow up. Did not get any help from this doctor for my issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She diagnosed the problem in no time. Ivf successful in first attempt. **** ********* ********** Will strongly recommend this doctor
